item.description:
BOSTON HARBOR PARTY CRUISE, JULY 24, LEAVING FROM ROWES WHARF, GATE C, AT 6:30 PM.

JOIN US FOR A PRE-CRUISE PARTY. MEET SOME OF THE PEOPLE WHO'LL BE PARTYING WITH US.[/b]

FRIDAY, JULY 16, at Holiday Inn Grand Ballroom, 929 Hingham St., Rockland. Exit 14, Rte. 228, off Rte. 3 south.
(781)871-0545.
www.se-4u.com.

Meet some of the people who'll be partying with us on our July 24th harbor cruise & dance.

Buy your tickets tonight for only $45. ALL THE FOOD YOU CAN EAT-ALL THE DANCING YOU CAN HANDLE. 180 women and an equal number of men...sorry, WOMEN ALREADY SOLD OUT.
Business-casual dress acceptable for this party...no dress code for the cruise. Singles Events For You.[/

Dancing till Midnight. Meet HUNDREDS OF SINGLES looking to meet you.
Questions, call 781-446-0234.
item.name: BOSTON HARBOR SINGLES HAWAIIAN CRUISE PARTY
